# Output directories
bin/
obj/

# User-specific files generated by Visual Studio
.vs/
.vscode/
.idea/

# User-specific settings files
# Windows Installer files
Thumbs.db
Desktop.ini

# Package and dependency cache
# .NET Core dependencies
.nuget/
packages/

# appsettings secrets (sensitive data)
appsettings.Production.json
appsettings.Local.json
secrets.json

# Local database files
*.mdf
*.ldf

# Docker build files and images (if you want to exclude the images from version control)
docker-compose.override.yml

# Visual Studio Code workspace and settings files
.vscode/

# IDE-specific files (e.g., JetBrains Rider)
.idea/

# NUnit or other testing artifacts
TestResults/
*.trx

# Local backup files (if any)
*~ 
*.bak
*.swp

# Global tool files for .NET
*.dotnet-tools.json

# user-specific config files
*.user
*.userosscache
*.suo
*.userprefs

# Ignore logs
*.log
